sentences.en: Acrobatics is hard to learn but beautiful to watch.
Acrobatics is very hard to learn.
Another things we do is Basketball, Soccer, and Acrobatics.
sentences.cn: 其他的训练项目也包括篮球, 足球和体操.

sentences.en: He proved a superlative student of acrobatics and martial arts; he started working in films at age 8.
sentences.cn: 在这里他证明自己是学杂技和武术的超级好手，他8岁开始在电影上露面。
他昨天的杂技表演十分惊险.

sentences.en: It's very difficult to see Chinese acrobatics at home.
sentences.cn: 在国内很难看到中国杂技.

sentences.en: Later a programme of music and acrobatics was presented.
sentences.cn: 后来演出了音乐、杂技节目.

sentences.en: One inverted, belly top, equestrian, scorpions crawling acrobatics is more realistic.
sentences.cn: 其中倒立 、 肚顶 、 马术 、 蝎子爬等杂技表演更为逼真.

sentences.en: Sports acrobatics is performed by men, women and juniors.
sentences.cn: 技巧有成年男女运动员和青少年男女运动员参加的比赛.

sentences.en: The choreography mixes swing dancing and acrobatics with the ballet influence.
sentences.cn: 该剧的舞蹈混合了摇摆舞、杂技,并受到了芭蕾舞的影响.

sentences.en: They showed off their acrobatics, to our great amusement.
sentences.cn: 他们表演杂技, 使我们感到有趣极了.

sentences.en: They were still doing wild acrobatics in the yard, turning somersaults and cartwheels.
sentences.cn: 他们还在院子里一通杂耍，翻着跟头，玩着侧手翻。

sentences.en: This Chinese Troupe is famous for its acrobatics.
sentences.cn: 这个中国马戏团以空中飞行杂技驰名.

sentences.en: We watched a performance which included a puppet show and acrobatics.
sentences.cn: 我们观看了一场演出,内容有木偶和杂技.

sentences.en: Wuqiao people practicing acrobatics with old customs and traditions.
sentences.cn: 吴桥人练杂技有古老的传统风俗.

words.tran_cn: 杂技演员，特技演员；随机应变者；翻云覆雨者，善变者

trans.tran_cn: 杂技，杂技艺术，特技飞行，巧妙手法
trans.tran_en: skilful movements of your body, for example jumping through the air or balancing on a rope
